p: Drugs u4nder this category usually follow either of the following three mechanisms in the virus-viral replication inhibition, ion channel inhibition and serine protease inhibition. Commercially available antiviral drugs mostly target the four major groups of viruses: human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), herpes, hepatitis and influenza ( Razonable, 2011). Earlier outbreak episodes of viral infections like SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV as well as hemorrhagic fever viruses like Ebola were treated with this category of drugs ( De Clercq, 2007).
